about_the_game:
If you sincerely enjoy playing SuchArt and want to make a contribution to the development of the game, you can support us by obtaining this pack — this will be a great contribution, we swear!

In return, you will get several items that will make your studio a bit cooler, such as:

  • Crabux Bucket
  • Crabux Plushie/Toy
  • Heart Pillow
  • Swag Large Brush

These items won’t drastically change the gameplay, but they will make you stand out from the crowd of those who don’t have them. And crabux are cute, right?

name: SuchArt - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-Bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: If you sincerely enjoy playing SuchArt and want to make a contribution to the development of the game, you can support us by obtaining this pack — this will be a great contribution, we swear!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
